concept.title: InApp
concept.shortdesc: Process guide for life cycle maintenance in ticketing system used by Chegg. inc.

conbody.p: Chegg. inc has it's own web interface defined, for managing the life cycle of each tickets. Client will upload their work on to this very ticketing system. these has to be selected carefully and processed. This document explains the procedure, rules and the tipis & tricks to be followed for a better maintenance of the ticketing system with quality results.
